name: Rite of Passage: The Lost Tides - A Mystery Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
name_original: Rite of Passage: The Lost Tides - A Mystery Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

Twenty years ago, your family set sail on the Everlast and on that fateful trip, the ship, and your parents, were never to be seen again. Today, as you prepare to observe the anniversary of their disappearance, the Everlast sails back into port and now you must find out what happened all those years ago!

• WILL YOU LEARN THE TRUTH OR SUFFER THE SAME FATE AS YOUR PARENTS?
The vessel that had surely sunk has magically returned… have your parents been alive all along?

• GATHER YOUR COURAGE AND BATTLE THE EVILS AFOOT
Play through a variety of mini-games and clever puzzles to get closer to the truth. Find out who, or what, tore your family apart!

• MAKE YOUR WAY TO THE LAND OF THE FORGOTTEN
Search through creative hidden object scenes and find out what mysterious spells the people of this realm are under.

• LEARN ABOUT THE MERMAID’S PAST IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Find out how it all began in the bonus game and also enjoy Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible items and achievements!
